header.title: Profile Guestbook
header.description: This MOD adds a guestbook to every users profile
header.author-notes:
This MOD _REQUIRES_ php5. Without php5 this MOD will NOT work! Support will only be provided at http://phpbbguestbook.com/index.php. No support will be provided at phpBB.com or any other site.
Please report bugs or request features in the correct tracker at http://phpbbguestbook.com/tracker.php
